Package model.database

Class DatabaseFilters

java.lang.Object
model.database.DatabaseFilters
public class DatabaseFilters extends Object
The class has methods for filtering data in the database.

    • filterByName

      public Predicate<Game> filterByName(String s2)
      Return a predicate that returns true if the name of either user in the game contains the string s2.
      Parameters:
      s2 - The string to search for
      Returns:
      A predicate that takes a Game and returns true if either of the users' names contains the string s2.
